last_episode_to_air.name: King Fendrich II
last_episode_to_air.overview: Moments before Fendrich can tear down city hall, Billy and Maddy learn the shocking truth of who owns the city.

name: LEGO City Adventures
overview: Welcome to LEGO City, a modern metropolis filled with the fiercest firefighters, the cream of the crop cops, and so many Blockheads. Every citizen will assemble together for the most awesomely awesome adventures.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: A school assignment to find out whose family founded and still owns the City sends Billy and Maddy across town on adventures with old friends and new faces. Ultimately, they not only learn about their City, but must save it!

episodes.name: Cubs and Robbers
episodes.overview: A movie promotion stunt goes wrong, unleashing a humongus "Cubby the Cop" balloon on the city.

episodes.name: Billy the Bug
episodes.overview: Fire Chief McCloud accidentally buys a malfunctioning Twirly Hat for her nephew.

episodes.name: Sky Police
episodes.overview: Police Chief Wheeler announces the formation of the 700 million dollar Sky Police.

episodes.name: Father's Day Parade
episodes.overview: Police captain, Tom Bennett, gets a call that his wife has gone into labor early.

episodes.name: Race to the Top
episodes.overview: Fendrich and Sinclair compete to win the City's tallest building contest.

episodes.name: Meet Harl Hubbs
episodes.overview: An off-screen narrator, narrates a day in the life of helpful handyman, Harl Hubbs.

episodes.name: Doorman of the City
episodes.overview: It's "Hands Off Day!" a city holiday, where the entire city doesn't use their hands for anything

episodes.name: Fendrich in the Wild
episodes.overview: A nature documentary crew follow Billionaire Fendrich as if he was an animal in the wild.

episodes.name: Poppy Starr
episodes.overview: Teenage superstar, Poppy Starr, visits her grandfather, Sargent Sam Grizzled.

episodes.name: The Spooky One
episodes.overview: Billy and Madison lose a flying disc inside a creepy looking house.

episodes.name: Small Carol
episodes.overview: The Mayor and Carol work late when strange events begin to happen.

episodes.name: Last Man Floating
episodes.overview: Extreme Sports host, Dynamo, holds a competition to see who will go on the City Mars mission.

episodes.name: Evil Layers
episodes.overview: Duke DeTain and Shirley Keeper investigate the true identity of the Master Criminal.

episodes.name: Buster
episodes.overview: Firefighter Buster Lloyd gets the opportunity to live out his fantasy of being a police officer.

episodes.name: Shirley Keeper
episodes.overview: Sanitation worker Shirley Keeper educates local residents on how to take care of their city.
It’s the day of the big rocket launch, and the entire city has Mars/launch fever!

episodes.name: Police Navidad
episodes.overview: It's Christmas Eve and Officer Duke DeTain is the only cop on patrol without a partner.

episodes.name: Paradoors
episodes.overview: Astronauts reach Mars orbit and prepare to launch their probes, but Tippy Doorman has other plans.

episodes.name: Slam the Door
episodes.overview: Harl attempts to prevent Tippy from bringing the fabled "Mars Door" back to Earth.

episodes.name: JAILBREAK!
episodes.overview: Tippy Dorman, faces the trial of the century after his attempt to take over the world.

episodes.name: Buster Moves
episodes.overview: It’s a mad dash by Buster to retrieve his runaway mustache in this fast-paced, zany city-wide chase.

episodes.name: To Cop or Not to Cop
episodes.overview: Grizzled and Rooky go undercover to root out the criminal mas-termind behind a counterfeit pie operation.

episodes.name: Handle with Car
episodes.overview: Duke gets a high tech, smart car. He and the temperamental car chase Ice Cream Truck Bandits

episodes.name: The Silver Blur
episodes.overview: The oblivious Ms. Blumfeld turns into a superhero, stopping crimes around the city, as Duke struggles with his orders to arrest her.

episodes.name: Harl Hubbs Day
episodes.overview: It's Harl Hubbs Day and Harl decided to help the whole city, but quickly discovers he isn't prepared for Harl mania

episodes.name: Ann They're Off
episodes.overview: Billy's mother, Ann, accepts a junkyard race challenge against the city's street racing legend, Tread Octane.

episodes.name: Bob and Clemmons' Excellent Adventure
episodes.overview: We pull back the curtain to see how Firemen Bob and Clemmons retrieve the bizarre requests of Chief Freya during a typical emergency.

episodes.name: The Man with No Name with a Name
episodes.overview: It’s an old west showdown, when a new adversary rolls into town.

episodes.name: Daisy Chain Gang
episodes.overview: Fendrich organizes a charity as a distraction while he attempts to steal the city deed. Sinclair gathers antiheroes to stop him.

episodes.name: Backdraft to School
episodes.overview: Freya is one credit short of graduating from the fire academy and is suspended as Fire Chief.

episodes.name: Running Mates
episodes.overview: Mayor Fleck is running for re-election against R E Fendrich who will stop at nothing to win to use his new power to defeat Sinclair once and for all.

episodes.name: Dirty Duke
episodes.overview: When Duke loses his memory, Snake Rattler tricks him into believing he's Snake’s criminal henchman.

episodes.name: For Wheeler
episodes.overview: When Rooky discovers it’s Chief Wheeler’s birthday, she is determined to make it a memorable.

episodes.name: Brickmuda Heptagon
episodes.overview: During the dedication ceremony of the city’s deep sea vessel to honor Duke, Freya and Harl, the ship is accidentally set adrift.

episodes.name: The Quacken
episodes.overview: When the mythical ocean monster, the Quacken, is sighted off the coast, famed adventurer Jessica Sharpe vows to capture it.

episodes.name: The Treasure of Nosepatch
episodes.overview: Rooky and Grizzled go undercover aboard the Guardian of the Oceans in search of a lost pirate treasure.

episodes.name: Midden Fleasure
episodes.overview: Fendrich and his gang learn of Cluster’s hidden junkyard treasure. Harl Cluster, Shirley and Tread unite to protect it.

episodes.name: Tread or Alive
episodes.overview: Snake and Daisy take advantage of Tread to get him to act as their getaway driver to pull off a heist.

episodes.name: Arrest Ye Merry Gentlemen
episodes.overview: When Fendrich threatens to ruin Sinclair's Holiday Gala, Duke intervenes to save both the party and the holidays

episodes.name: Ride Along Kid
episodes.overview: Freya takes Billy and Mark on a ride along

episodes.name: Thank Hank
episodes.overview: Tired of the constant disrespect, Hacksaw Hank quits Fendrich's crew and goes to work for Mary Sinclair.

episodes.name: Are The Kids Watching?
episodes.overview: Lt. Gracie Goodhart joins an Officer Exchange Programme and rivals Duke's standing as City's most beloved police officer.

episodes.name: Shirley P.I.
episodes.overview: News anchor Craig Woodman goes missing, Gabby Tocamera desperately turns to Shirley Keeper for help.

episodes.name: Please and Fang You
episodes.overview: When the city's power grid overloads, Master Architect, Ave Empire must save the day - if he can prove that he is not a vampire.

episodes.name: Class Act
episodes.overview: When student’s computer tablets go missing, Detectives Grizzled and Partnur go undercover as a student and a teacher to catch the thief.

episodes.name: We're #1
episodes.overview: "The Police vs Fire charity turns from good-natured to angry after competitive Tread Octane is brought in as a last minute replacement."

episodes.name: Wylde Wex
episodes.overview: After thawing his best friend, Dr. Wylde, Dr. Wexler must help Wylde adjust to this modern, one-year-later world.

episodes.name: Business is Booming
episodes.overview: Tired of living with her overbearing mother, Daisy starts her own business in order to buy a dynamite factory as a new hideout.

episodes.name: Makeover and Over
episodes.overview: With the help of Harl Hubbs' giant crane, Ave Empire is determined to put his opera house in the perfect spot in the city.

episodes.name: Lights!, Camera!, Grizzled!
episodes.overview: Detective Sam Grizzled is hired as a consultant on a movie about an action-packed bank robbery he foiled in his early police days.

episodes.name: Duke Time
episodes.overview: When an exhausted Duke Detain makes an uncharacteristic mistake on duty, he volunteers to take his first-ever day off.

episodes.name: Harpy Stubbs
episodes.overview: An unlikely friendship develops between Poppy Starr, the world's biggest pop star, and Harl Hubbs, the city's humble, helpful handyman.

episodes.name: Quantifying Intrepidness
episodes.overview: In order to save a newspaper, Maddy becomes intrepid reporter, Nomi D. Plume and uses her anonymity as a kid to break exclusive scoops.

episodes.name: Green Light
episodes.overview: Fendrich tries to steal a high-tech device being transported to the Eco-Power Plant. Wheeler sends the reluctant Alan to stop him.

episodes.name: My Cool Aunt Freya
episodes.overview: Freya’s quest to have fun with her nephew goes out of control when she reconnects with the inner-wild child she spent years learning to suppress.

episodes.name: The Cow Jumped Over The Spoon
episodes.overview: Westbrook W. Sleet tracks the mysterious Standing Cow of the Lowlands, which he believes is loose in the city – which could create havoc.

episodes.name: Stunt City
episodes.overview: The stunt team shows up in the city ready to dazzle, they see the daily action around the city and realize they need to up their game.

episodes.name: Of Dads and Dudes
episodes.overview: Chief Wheeler’s stern, uptight father comes to the city with plans to invest in the big stunt show Wheeler loves.

episodes.name: Fool on Fleck
episodes.overview: When the mysterious Prankster mails Mayor Fleck a threat to prank him in public, Carol asks Duke to be the reluctant mayor’s bodyguard.

episodes.name: Ramping Up
episodes.overview: Fire Marshal Finn McCormack’s small town ways clash with the chaotic city and decides safety changes need to be made to the new stunt show.

episodes.name: Give 'Em A Hand
episodes.overview: Billy and Maddy join a kid’s citywide obstacle course with the help of the stunt team.

episodes.name: Natural Habitat
episodes.overview: Gabby Tocamera hosts a documentary about the green city and finds a mystery surrounding the disappearance of the beloved sewer dolphins.

episodes.name: The Brawl in City Hall
episodes.overview: Saving Maddy’s mom when the City Hall security system runs amok, Billy and Maddy find a clue to the City founder’s identity.

episodes.name: Who is Ludmilla Ersatz?
episodes.overview: With help from the kids, Daisy "Kaboom" Lewis creates an alter ego to take the blame for her past mis-deeds, but two identities prove hard to maintain.

episodes.name: Crisis on Moonbase: Momentous!
episodes.overview: Billy must save his astronaut hero when Captain Momentous hallucinates an alien invasion after eating expired astronaut food.

episodes.name: Wreckless Driving
episodes.overview: Billy and Maddy must help Stunt Driver Wallop pass a safe driving course, or risk being banned from City streets forever.

episodes.name: A House Divided
episodes.overview: Cultures clash when the fire department moves in temporarily with the police department following damage to their station.

episodes.name: The Trojan Slooshie
episodes.overview: The Ice Cream Truck Bandits waylay the police force with frozen drinks, giving the officers Glacial Brain Freeze.

episodes.name: Born to Direct
episodes.overview: Maddy's filmmaking ambitions go wild when she offers to direct a fire safety video.

episodes.name: The Wexler Deflector Conjecture
episodes.overview: Depressed, Dr. Wexler quits science. But when a meteor threatens the City, Billy and Maddy must persuade him back!

episodes.name: Billy to the Max
episodes.overview: Billy worries he won’t meet his Mom’s expectations when she signs them up for a charity event’s team physical challenges.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad… and the Turtles
episodes.overview: Maddy takes in two lost turtles, unaware that they belong to rivals Sinclair and Fendrich, who believe she's kidnapped them.

episodes.name: Day of the Dread
episodes.overview: With their best friends out of town, Maddy and Dread spend the day together and struggle to find common ground.

episodes.name: Mr. Produce Buys the Farm
episodes.overview: After buying a farm to grow his own produce, Mr. Produce becomes convinced neighbouring farmers are out to get him.

episodes.name: This Land is Harl's Land
episodes.overview: Fendrich and Sinclair forge an unlikely alliance to try and drive Harl off a piece of undeveloped land he owns.

episodes.name: Shirley Overdrive
episodes.overview: Shirley Keeper infiltrates the city's underworld to retrieve the secret formula for Vita Rush's new flavour.

episodes.name: Yes, No, Maybe So?
episodes.overview: To build an environmentally-unfriendly factory, Fendrich preys on Mayor Fleck's need to be liked to approve his project.

episodes.name: Grizzled and Grizzled-er
episodes.overview: Detective Grizzled's first partner of bad habits returns to the City, causing frustration for his current partner, Rooky.

episodes.name: Freya, Basically
episodes.overview: The kids notice that Freya is in a rut when it comes to making firefighting decisions, so they help her get her groove back.

episodes.name: Where in the World is Sheep Wheeler?
episodes.overview: When they learn Fendrich owns the city, the kids need Chief Wheeler's help, but he may have magically turned into a sheep.

episodes.name: King Fendrich I
episodes.overview: Billy, Maddy, and friends resist Fendrich's iron rule and desperately try to prove that he does not, in fact, own the city.

episodes.name: King Fendrich II
episodes.overview: Moments before Fendrich can tear down city hall, Billy and Maddy learn the shocking truth of who owns the city.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: A school assignment to find out whose family founded and still owns the City sends Billy and Maddy across town on adventures with old friends and new faces. Ultimately, they not only learn about their City, but must save it!
